Erin Lacey, MS

Administrative Manager

Erin Lacey is the administrative manager of VasCore, where she manages daily office workflow along with the operational, financial and legal aspects of VasCore.

Erin has been working for VasCore since June 2014. Prior to joining Vascore, Erin worked within Massachusetts General Hospital, since 2010, in an administrative coordinator role while earning her Master of Science degree in health informatics and management from the University of Massachusetts.
